name: PLANTGIRL
description:
Play as Plantgirl and escape the laboratory that created her in this 3D stealth game.

Here's a little prototype that I never finished.

It contains one level where you have to help plantgirl escape from the laboratory that created her, find the right security passes for the doors.

Follow me on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/GalaethGames

Controls

MOVE: AWSD / Arrow Keys / Gamepad
Knock on wall: N / Shift / L Button
Throw Cigarette butt: M/Z/R button
Hide: Control / Gamepad A button
Action (open doors/activate machines/knock things off): Space / B button
Pause: P / Start button
